sub_title: Available. Driven, ICT skilled Electrical Engineer, with passion for planning, projects and processes. Go-getter is looking for a new challenge in energy transition and data analysis. Connector between knowledge&people.
summary:
Electrical Engineer, gained valuable work experience in various positions, in leading state-owned company, where the values ​​of teamwork, flexibility, professionalism, business-mindedness and innovation were part of the ambassadorship of the highly regarded state-owned company.

In the role of connector in projects (steering, preparing, planning project implementation). Pivot in various IT projects and coordinator with innovative results in energy consumption process with 27 different electricity companies.

IT Training provided new software and process training to other departments of the state-owned company and to 27 other electricity companies.

Analyzing statistical data (electricity consumption), accurate forecasting and analyzing data, from precise and correct entry of all research electricity data, also using SQL statements.

Providing electrical data information, creating reports Business 2 Business and support, development of working documentation, quality assurance processes and other administrative tasks/activities.

Development-oriented. Curious attitude. I like to learn in all possible areas (personal, technical, financial, development etc.), both with studies, courses, as well as with my own experience and learning from experts.

My migration background is from one of the most beautiful countries in the world, from Colombia, Latin America. Colombian workers are among the best qualified in Latin America (source: flandersinvestmentandtrade.com). The country has an excellent education system. The literacy rate is around 95%.

I have broad interests and I have enjoyed performing various hobbies. My favorite ones are: volunteering (mediation), walking in nature, volleyball, scuba diving, Zumba, learning technique, chess, traveling and photography.

company.name: XM Market Energy Control and Operations Experts

profile_positions.description:
• Leading Business 2 Business processes and executing projects related to day-to-day activities in electricity consumption across the country
• Managing and monitoring the technical implementation projects together with the IT department as Senior IT end user
• Management statistics developing, analyzing and forecasting electricity consumption (short & long term) on the electricity demand per substation, city and country
• Ensuring correct analysis of asset data: pay attention to details and automatic input data to databases, software or electronic fields, checking and verifying data entered correctly and accurately into database
• Enhancing the quality of the forecasts and asset data of the historical series for each item and increase
data quality with statistical methodologies
• Internship supervision W.O. students for various process projects
• Ensuring and improving services and guaranteeing/monitoring the quality of the execution of processes
• Analyzing and Managing pre- and detail engineering: power systems and electrical infrastructure for the prevention and correction of electrical failures in the electrical infrastructure in the country and association with other countries
• Responding to internal customer and government requirements, customer follow-up, interaction between suppliers, departments and both internal and external customers in accordance with company guidelines
• Organizing meetings and training courses, addressing training to internal staff and employees of other electricity companies (50 participants per training) to improve their function on supply chain
• Working with all administrative tasks and other activities
• Excellent command of Ms. office.
profile_positions.title: Asset Data(Energy) Analyst / (WO)

profile_positions.description:
• Managing large flows of energy data (historical consumption) eg data in SCADA, DB Oracle, or electric fields, collect cross checking, auditing, and verifying data entered correctly and accurately in the database then examining and adaptation it into understandable information 
• Work preparation, execution as end user and testing of the software project with regard to the historical consumption and the projections of the energy consumption, validation and checking of the data with the information from the previous system 
• Daily preparation of management reports and other reports on a daily, monthly and annual basis 
• Customer service Business 2 Business for the government and other customers: responding to internal customer and government requirements, customer follow-up, interaction between suppliers, departments and both internal and external customers in accordance with company guidelines 
• Excellent command of Ms. office.
profile_positions.title: Data Energy Assistant (HBO)

profile_positions.description:
• Starting, planning, testing and implementation small to big-sized IT projects for internal customers, government and other electrical companies 
• Coordinating client project requirements and ensuring the interaction and liaison between the external IT companies other internal departments and external clients 
• Assisting in defining project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility 
• Establishing proper compliance with the development standard and monitoring system design developments 
• Managing the quality and success of projects by actively managing the decision-making process 
• Organizing meetings-training and addressing training on new software for employees of the company and the personnel of other energy companies (more than 100) 
• Maintaining the databases (Oracle, Scada, VMX, SCA) 
• Managing Databases and Software in Oracle, Visual Basic, PowerBuilder among others
• IT help desk: coordination and solving software problems 
• All administrative work such as: managing agenda, making presentations, bookings and reservations for hotels, flights and accommodations for training 
• Excellent control, maintenance and automation of small reports in Ms. office.
profile_positions.title: IT-Data Information Project Assistant (HBO)

profile_positions.description:
• Processing and analyzing large flows of electrical variables of the electrical sector, collecting, checking, researching and converting into comprehensible information
• Automatization reports and making improvements to daily, monthly and annual reports.
• Making the management report, presentations to the managers of the company and goverment
• Migration of database information to new software
• Manual composition of quality, document controlling, digitization and archiving
• Answering and creating reports for Business 2 Business energy customers and government
• All administrative work such as: managing agenda, making presentations, dealing with questions and/or complaints from customers and suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Information Assistant (BI) (HBO)

profile_positions.description:

• Inventory of materials 
• Creating the working conditions for the maintenance project, clear logistics planning, loading and unloading of materials in the company, equipment and tools 
• Making the management report and reporting to the manager 
• Processing, recording and confirming all inventories according to company instructions 
• Maintaining a good relationship and contact with the customer 
• Feedback on sold products and maintaining contacts by telephone and other marketing activities.
